responseText: We'll provide ye with a whole set o' tools--nae quality--but functional tools. In return, I'll have ye harvest snowdrop plants, bring 'em back here, an' process them ta powder at the herbalism station. We need it fer healin' salves what with all th' goblin attacks.
name: DD_0103_BriarmoorFarmsTradesfolkRep_11_Response
